title: Unlucky Yarn
summaries: The Unlucky Yarn is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Black Cat to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, it will fly on a broom to catch up with them. The Unlucky Yarn has a 1/150 (0.67%) chance of being obtained from Goodie Bags during the Halloween seasonal event.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
